actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 15 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize payment of nonservice-connected pension to veterans of certain peacetime service and their widows and children.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of non-service-connected pensions to veterans of specified peacetime service and their widows and children. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 501, 521, 541, 542).

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 15 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize payment of nonservice-connected pension to veterans of certain peacetime service and their widows and children.
